attributes.action: stop using taxpayers money to fund the governments political campaigning
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign if you are fed up of seeing the government using your money to campaign for the governing party. Some government communication is fine and keeps the people informed, but a 40% increase in the run up to an election and costly taxpayer funded visits to marginal seats are not right. Examples include: the policing pledge advert, a cabinet visit with senior ministers organising a party event, spending £1 million advertising a government website.
